actions.committee: Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on Small Business, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law

official_title: To protect the rights of small entities subject to investigative or enforcement action by agencies, and for other purposes.
short_title: Small Business Regulatory Bill of Rights Act
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Small Business Regulatory Bill of Rights Act - Amends Federal civil service law to enumerate the rights of small business entities before (including a voluntary no-fault compliance audit program and a compliance assistance program), during, and after an investigative or enforcement action, with certain exceptions and limitations.

titles.title: Small Business Regulatory Bill of Rights Act
To protect the rights of small entities subject to investigative or enforcement action by agencies, and for other purposes.
